name: 3 Bundles Specials on 100% 4AAA Virgin Brazilian Remy Hair (BODY WAVE)
description:
3 Bundle Hair Specials, on 100% 4AAAA Virgin Brazilian Hair. This hair is 100% Virgin Hair, and can be dyed and Ombre’. Hair is 100% Virgin and only comes in Natural Black color (1B). VIRGIN HAIR ONLY COMES IN NATURAL BLACK (1B)

Our hair doesn’t tangle or shed, and lasts up to a year or more if properly taken care of. Each bundle is 4 oz, and 2-3 bundles is enough to do a full head sew-in. You shouldn't need more than 3 bundles to do a full head. Hair can be curled and styled instantly, if you know what you doing, and is very manageable.

Our hair is unprocessed, and hasn’t been altered in any way by any chemicals. It can be colored and Ombre’, any way you want to, or just left Natural Black. The hair is 4AAAA, which is the highest rating Virgin hair can have.

For now I have FREE SHIPPING, anywhere in the United States, FREE SHIPPING in the United States, If you want Rush Shipping its $20, and it could be there the next day, FOR EXPRESS NEXT DAY SHIPPING ITS ONLY $20, CLICK ON THE OPTION IN SHIPPING THAT SAYS EVERYWHERE ELSE. All packages come through the Post Office, so leave a clear address after you order. Take advantage of this free shipping special I am doing, before I take it off. 

FOR EXPRESS NEXT DAY SHIPPING ITS ONLY $20, CLICK ON THE OPTION IN SHIPPING THAT SAYS EVERYWHERE ELSE

name: Per Bundle Prices for 100% 4AAAA Virgin Brazilian Hair (BODY WAVE)
description:
100% 4AAA Virgin Brazilian Hair (Body Wave) Per Bundle Prices, these are the prices on 1 BUNDLE, if you want to save money on bundles, I suggest you get the 3 BUNDLES Special.

This is 100% 4AAAA Virgin Brazilian Hair. This hair is 100% Virgin Hair, and can be dyed and Ombre’. Hair is 100% Virgin and only comes in Natural Black color (1B). VIRGIN HAIR ONLY COMES IN NATURAL BLACK (1B).

Our hair doesn’t tangle or shed, and lasts up to a year or more if properly taken care of. Each bundle is 4 OZ (4 Ounces) , and 2-3 bundles is enough to do a full head sew-in. You shouldn't need more than 3 bundles to do a full head. Hair can be curled and styled instantly, if you know what you doing, and is very manageable.

Our hair is unprocessed, and hasn’t been altered in any way by any chemicals. It can be colored and Ombre’, any way you want to, or just left Natural Black. The hair is 4AAAA, which is the highest rating Virgin hair can have.

The free shipping only applies to the 3 Bundle Special, shipping is only $5, for each bundle inside the United States, and $1 for any extra bundle, so if you getting two bundles it would be $6

FOR EXPRESS NEXT DAY SHIPPING ITS ONLY $20, CLICK ON THE OPTION IN SHIPPING THAT SAYS EVERYWHERE ELSE
